DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , 24-week study evaluate efficacy safety AXS-02 subject knee osteoarthritis associate bone marrow lesion .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety AXS-02 Subjects With Knee OA Associated With Bone Marrow Lesions
DOC.criteria: Key Male least 50 year age , postmenopausal female Meets ACR clinical criterion knee osteoarthritis Bone Marrow Lesion knee present MRI Additional criterion may apply Key Previous surgery index knee Any prior use bisphosphonates within 6 month screen Additional criterion may apply
